alizadeh2019psychology.title: Psychology and morality of political extremists: evidence from Twitter language analysis of alt-right and Antifa
alizadeh2019psychology.author: Alizadeh, Meysam and Weber, Ingmar and Cioffi-Revilla, Claudio and Fortunato, Santo and Macy, Michael
alizadeh2019psychology.paperMotivationText: Experiments, surveys and analyses are scarce when it comes to political extremism.
alizadeh2019psychology.paperContributionText: The authors test several hypothesis about the psychological and moral profiles of political extremist and their differences with partisan users using Twitter data of US left- and right-wing extremist groups.
alizadeh2019psychology.paperResultsText: Their results are in general agreement with MFT and this theory can be generalized to political extremism context.
alizadeh2019psychology.resourcesOtherText: Southern Poverty Law Center website (SPLC 2018), LIWC lexicon
